Package by.bsuir.oop.shytsikau.graphic.figures.composite

Class Polygon

java.lang.Object
by.bsuir.oop.shytsikau.graphic.figures.AbstractFigure
by.bsuir.oop.shytsikau.graphic.figures.RectangleBounds
by.bsuir.oop.shytsikau.graphic.figures.composite.Polyline
by.bsuir.oop.shytsikau.graphic.figures.composite.Polygon
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompositeFigure, Figure
Direct Known Subclasses:
IsoscelesTriangle, Parallelogram
public abstract class Polygon extends Polyline
A class that represents polygon. The calculation of polyline coordinates is performed with polyline logic (with added closing line)
See Also:

    • Polygon

      public Polygon(Point startPoint, Point... point)
      Constructor is used when all the points of polygon is known
      Parameters:
      startPoint - anchor of polygon
      point - array of all polygon points including startPoint

    • Polygon

      public Polygon(Point startPoint, int width, int height)
      Constructor is used when all the points will be calculated from startPoint, width, height arguments
      Parameters:
      startPoint - anchor of polygon
      width - width if child class has rectangle bounds - optional
      height - height if child class has rectangle bounds - optional

      • RectangleBounds
